## The United Generations is a social enterprise aimed at developing local and sustainable strategies to empower the older population and bridge the gap among generations through education, art, and design.

For more information please reach: [info@](mailto:info@theuntedgenerations.com)adalbertolonardi.com

Perspective coloured pencil and oil stick hand drawing representing a family of different ethnicities with cats, dogs and birds eating around a wooden table across two rooms divided by a blue wall and aluminum foldable doors.
